text: __NOTOC__ Year 239 (CCXXXIX) was a common year starting on Tuesday of the Julian calendar. == Events == === By place === ==== China ==== * In the Chinese Kingdom of Wei, Wei Qi Wang succeeds Cao Rui (Wei Ming Di). * Chinese discover the island of Taiwan. === By topic === ==== Religion ==== * Origen publishes the Old Testament in five languages. == Births == * == Deaths == * January 22 - Cao Rui (Wei Ming Di), emperor of the Kingdom of Wei (b. 205) * Pan Jun, official of Wu Category:230s
